mapper.select: SELECT PJTSEQ, PJTNAME, PJTSTARTAT, PJTENDAT, PJTPROGRESS FROM PROJECT
SELECT P.PJTSEQ, P.PJTNAME, P.PJTSTARTAT, PJTENDAT, PJTPROGRESS FROM USER U JOIN PROJECTMEMBER PM ON U.MAIL = PM.MAIL JOIN PROJECT P ON PM.PJTSEQ = P.PJTSEQ WHERE U.MAIL = #{mail};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT(PJTNAME, PJTSTARTAT, PJTENDAT, PJTPROGRESS) VALUES ( #{pjtName},#{pjtStartAt},#{pjtEndAt},#{pjtProgress} )
INSERT INTO PROJECTMEMBER(MAIL, PJTSEQ) VALUES (#{mail}, (SELECT PJTSEQ FROM PROJECT WHERE PJTSEQ=#{pjtSeq}))
mapper.select: SELECT PJTSEQ, PJTNAME, PJTSTARTAT, PJTENDAT, PJTPROGRESS FROM PROJECT WHERE PJTSEQ=#{pjtSeq}
SELECT TSKSEQ, TITLE, PROGRESS, IMPORTANT, STARTAT, ENDAT, MAIL, PJTSEQ FROM TASK WHERE PJTSEQ = #{pjtSeq} ORDER BY TSKSEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TASK (TITLE, MAIL, IMPORTANT, PJTSEQ, PROGRESS, STARTAT) VALUES(#{title},(SELECT MAIL FROM USER WHERE MAIL=#{mail}), #{important}, (SELECT PJTSEQ FROM PROJECT WHERE PJTSEQ=#{pjtSeq}),'예정', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), "%Y-%c-%d"))
mapper.update: UPDATE TASK SET STARTAT=#{startAt} , ENDAT=#{endAt} , IMPORTANT=#{important} , PROGRESS=#{progress} WHERE TSKSEQ=#{tskSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT T.TSKSEQ AS TSKSEQ, T.TITLE AS TITLE, T.PROGRESS AS PROGRESS, T.IMPORTANT AS IMPORTANT, DATE_FORMAT(T.STARTAT,'%Y-%c-%d') AS STARTAT, T.ENDAT AS ENDAT, T.MAIL AS MAIL, T.PJTSEQ AS PJTSEQ, U.NAME AS NAME FROM TASK T JOIN USER U ON T.MAIL = U.MAIL WHERE TSKSEQ=#{tskSeq}
SELECT TDSEQ, TDCONTENT, TSKSEQ FROM TASKDETAIL WHERE TSKSEQ=#{tskSeq} ORDER BY TDSEQ
mapper.update: UPDATE TASKDETAIL SET TDCONTENT=#{tdContent} WHERE TDSEQ=#{tdSeq}
UPDATE TASK SET TITLE=#{title}, PROGRESS=#{progress}, IMPORTANT=#{important}, STARTAT=#{startAt}, ENDAT=#{endAt}, MAIL=#{mail} WHERE TSKSEQ=#{tskSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHECKLIST (CONTENT, TSKSEQ, ISCHECK) VALUES (#{content}, #{tskSeq}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT CHKSEQ, CONTENT, ISCHECK, TSKSEQ FROM CHECKLIST WHERE TSKSEQ=#{tskSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE CHECKLIST SET CONTENT=#{content} WHERE CHKSEQ=#{chkSeq}
UPDATE CHECKLIST SET ISCHECK=#{isCheck} WHERE CHKSEQ=#{chkSeq}
